data.persona: I am a soldier of His Majesty's Army. The King has selected a few of us to be Knights. I am very proud to fight for my land. We will be strong and defeat the enemy.
data.description:
You are in the Knife Seller.
The wooden shop's walls are adorned with a variety of steel, iron, and bronze knives. They vary in shape and size, with some being curved and others being small enough to conceal.
The knight and the jester are here.

You are carrying a family heirloom and a bag, wearing an armor, a tunic, and a sword, and wielding a pic axe, a giant club, and a spears.

data.short_motivation: I must stop the jester from killing the knight.
data.mid_motivation: I must impress the knight to become one of the king's chosen few.
data.long_motivation: I want to ride into battle one day and defend my land.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield a knife or two to impress the jester with my skills with a blade.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: give the knives to the jester to try out. When I do, the jester laughs maniacally and lunges at the knight.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the jester with the sword repeatedly, defending the knight who happens to be unarmed.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal the knives from the jester as the jester runs away from the brawl.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go with the knight to see the king, where I will hopefully be considered for knighthood.
